column4: i didi a search to see difference between Mint KDE and Kubuntu (ubuntu with kde)  someone said..Same (bleep) different Apps...what does he mean by apps? apps such as Thunderbird, Firefox, etc?
can u give me an example of an app that mint would use that ubuntu cannot? becuase i thought mint is ubuntu with different looks
linux is linux. most all distros can have the same apps.
they do  a little more then just change the looks i recall.
